scripts.sample: tsc sample.ts parsers/*.ts && browserify sample.js -d -o sampleOut.js
scripts.convert: browserify docs/convert/convert.js -d -o docs/convert/convertOut.js && cat node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css node_modules/codemirror/addon/fold/foldgutter.css docs/convert/convert.css > docs/convert/convertOut.css
